SELECT d.* FROM ( SELECT id id, name name, description description, location location, status status, DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y.%m.%d %T') createTime, DATE_FORMAT(update_time, '%Y.%m.%d %T') updateTime FROM lab WHERE status != -1 ORDER BY id LIMIT #{offSet}, #{pageRow} ) d ORDER BY d.id
